I am a German Entrepreneur, health enthusiast and striving renessaince man now residing in the beautiful Stockholm. My passions lie in the balance between enabling technologies and the retrospective consciousness of basic human needs, such as natural nutrition and lifestyle. I am currently COO of Airinum where we are trying to raise attention for the growing problem of air pollution and its devastating effects on environment and human health. My skills include 3D product visualizations, full-stack development and web design, operations and supply chain management, and product development and manufacturing. My hobbies include reading, photography, cooking, travelling and learning new things.
